channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - April 30, 2021
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-april-30-2021) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _Against the Demonic Conspiracy_ * _Feathers_ * _Future Creep_ * _Iron Edda: World of Metal and Bone_ * _Neon City Overdrive_ * _Season of Dreams_ * _The Dee Sanction_ * _Thirsty Cheerleading Lesbians_ * _Trophy Dark_ * _Zombie World_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Calendar category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-calendar) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Calendar](https://gauntletcalendar.com/events) to play!

item.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - April 30, 2021
item.dc:creator: @flatvurm
item.description:
@flatvurm wrote:

Greetings, all! This week’s Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we’ve got sessions of these great games:

  • Against the Demonic Conspiracy
  • Feathers
  • Future Creep
  • Iron Edda: World of Metal and Bone
  • Neon City Overdrive
  • Season of Dreams
  • The Dee Sanction
  • Thirsty Cheerleading Lesbians

  • Zombie World

Thanks go out to all this week’s facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the Gauntlet Calendar category on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the Gauntlet Calendar to play!
